page.title: 04The Drunk Mans Fight.
page.content: The stone at Rodburs lane is called Chants man. The{story}is that back in the coaching day's Pye corner farm was an{inn. One night the villagers decided to play a trick on chant so they dressed the stone in an overcoat and hat.On leaving the{pub}a little merry he came to the top of the lane and thought he saw a person standing there so he said good night to the person but received no reply. He spoke again but still no reply. After this he lost his temper and fought the stone. He injured himself so badly that he later died from the injuries . The stone can still be seen today, although at this time of year (summer) it is likely to be overgrown with weeds and very difficult to find.
